name: The Ugly Club
description:
[28/1/22 9:00am NZT: WOOPS SORRY I patched something and now the download is goofed up for some people; I'm reuploading it, apologies! Should be good by this afternoon.]

You have just transferred to the University of Otago.

The Bird of the Year Ball -- the biggest night of the year -- is in three days.

Who will you bring as a date?

(NOTE: Includes references to drugs and alcohol.)

---

Welcome to the first ever Aotearoa-based dating simulator. 

The Ugly Club was developed in conjunction with a thesis for my Master of Science Communication at the University of Otago. Can video games be used as a vessel for science? How about for encouraging empathy and understanding of Aotearoa's forgotten species? I hope you have fun playing, and possibly learn a thing or too as well. 

It's still undergoing playtesting and a bit choppy in areas! Some bits might be broken! Please save lots and let me know of any errors! If some science feels shoehorned in that's because it is. x

(Note: Ngaio's 3rd date will be changed at some point. I do not currently possess the engine/skills required to make the funky karaoke minigame of my dreams.)
